lines.text: They're gonna get in here and they're gonna kill us! We're all gonna die!
So we'll die. Deronda, life is fleeting, film is immortal.

[to advancing zombies]
Take another step and your DEAD... er!

]
Give me the keys or I'll kill you.
More times than they will. You only have to die once today.
How can God allow this to happen?
God abandoned this world long ago. We brought this upon ourselves.
Do we have a chance? As a race, as human beings. Will there be a tomorrow?
It has always been man's destiny to destroy himself.
I woke up this morning, only to see the rest of my life beyond me. I'm so afraid to die.
And here, I thought that stinky smell was bile.
I'm talkin' about fleas, Donny. Mindless hopping vermin, ofttimes carried by mangy strays, and by people of questionable nature. People who turn backs on friends and the like.
I just want to live, Tom. That's all any of us want, is to live.
No one lives. End of the day, Donny, we're all chalkmarks.

[Looking down at three dead men, all wearing red shirts, after a minor explosion]
Figures...
